name: BachelorRecipes
0:
”Alexa open bachelor kitchen”
”Alexa open bachelor kitchen and tell me a relaxed veg main course for dinner”
”Alexa open bachelor kitchen and tell me a easy meat starter for dinner”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bachelor kitchen
des: Easy Indian recipes with complete steps for cooking is presented. Based on the diet preference, the day of the meal, time available and the component of the meal, a suitable recipe is selected. The selection is random to ensure that the recipes are not repeated.
